Detailed Description

Gaussian white noise (zero mean) covariance function

double WhiteNoiseCF::computeElement ( const vec &  A,
const vec &  B 
) const [inline, virtual]

Covariance between two inputs. If the two inputs are identical, this returns the noise variance, and zero otherwise.

Parameters:
A the first input
B the second input
Returns:
the noise variance if A == B, 0 otherwise
